comment: Wuhan mayor Zhou Xianwang, with his mask upside down after visiting the frontline, said 5 million people left the city before the lockdown. Hotels in many cities have rejected offering rooms to anyone with a Hubei residence ID. https://t.co/GO6TvbBipZ

Hubei provincial chief Wang Xiaodong claimed the production capacity for masks was 10.8 billion. He then apologized for mixing up the number and said it was actually 1.8 billion and then changed it again to 1.08 million. I https://t.co/n4nwaXYYo2

Wuhan mayor Zhou Xianwang (wearing his mask correctly this time) admitted on TV that the public shouldve been warned about the #coronarvirus sooner, but he blamed his superiors for not authorizing the local gov to speak up. He offered to resign as long as the virus is contained. https://t.co/25mrvvidSp
